1618547913_1Gg1sTkqAaXfMmVVG6yghf3FF8D3R.body:
A thing I consider important is -- critical time of probable weakness --. It means to be conscious when expected temptation will present itself, and have already a strategy in place and some tactics in case of failure. 

For example right now I may be tempted to zap on a french tv, and as I consciously think about it, I will try to be careful to not fall on this trap, and for example be active in my choice of tv watching. 

It means that I won't avoid the medium of perdition, or time vampire but think about something else, like a animal channel or russian news :). Who knows... but careful.

gl&hf.

almost perfect, I sadly drifted two times on euronews, but not enough to even understand what they were talking about... why euronews too? because it's based in Lyon, and as it's in france, it's tainted.

I failed... or more exactly I wasn't careful... wanting to zap from some corporate narrative, I used my muscle memory and end up on a french news(=propaganda) channel, moreover in a state of panic I moved to the next channel, which is too a french (news=propaganda) channel, finally I was able to escape from this braintrap.. the whole event lasted maybe 2 secs, at worst, but it was already another proof that vigilance must be maintain at all moment, or resaid, attention, the failures will strike when not expecting... the time vampire is a dangerous machine...

it may happen again, but at least I wasn't exposed much :)

What a success, mentally I feel way better than when I watched this shit! one thing I love with moneytv(s), is that, yes, there is a lot of corporate narrative, but it's always possible to check the price independently, and I have never seen cnbc or bloombergtv lie about the price. I have seen both gone completely ape shit crazy to remove trump, political, but on the economical side... they are trapped :)

one fun storry is when they tried on the onset of the panedemic to do some perception management, at the end of the day they were so proud of themselves... and then it moved :). And no words of them could matter, just commenting the flow :).

so conclusion : great day 1 ! how long? till the revolution/liberation? heheheh.

Why it sank me to watch them? For example I know that CNN is enemy media, but there is no doubt, even if fully biased, they have at least great image and visual from foreign places (like the recent tour in ukraine, or afghanistan or many others). On the contrary those french "news" channels have moved to the anger / talking head model... And they are sooooo dumb. beyond anything imaginable, linking to my nutrional theory with excessive sulfite in their diets... and such an incapacity to understand the world current map, and I don't mean it physically... it's such a vulgarity, such a pathetic self serving crowd, of worthless individuals, unable even to apprehend their own weaknesses. valueless, but as fertilizers. they may write without mistakes, however their expression isn't very advanced, and worst of all, it's the hoplessness... between the immgration support, the constant looting, the high tax rates, the lack of democracy, this self serving state, their war on plants, the eu integration and worst of all their cult of the uno... and the whole with their inability to understand any of it... and even worst their inability to understand market dynamics... there almost only 1 or 2 okay... like the fat with the small glass on a clone of cnbc (bfm business) and on the same channel the brown air guy, who gets it... that's typically when the praetorian guard and those before them had to move the object. It was always fun when the sec team of this forward operator (the proconsul) where faced with those tasked by ROME to remove him, and them if they opposed, which they most of the time didn't...

they knew, they would killed, traded, or used as actors in some entertainment form :).

and yes I saw the end of keane yesterady, poor man... you know dude, if trump is a pedo, which I highly believe (like 90% certitude), you could have ARRESTED and EXECUTED him, but if it was because this guy wasn't bowing to your authority, he was just following the constitution, and yes, I understand, lazy and greazy state operators may be surprised by the speed required to move in NYC building industry... 

DO.

you have a lot of inner soul searching and thinking to do, yes, you the pedogens who so proudly went on tv during the regime change operations... keane, mattis, the one with his mini suit case, at least odierno didn't fall that low... suckers.

Personally, I think that right now it's the REAL BLM... I mean by this that in the summer it the was the ground forces of obiden in action, you can see it by the level of professionalism and support they got, be it from the msn, or the violence deployed, with the goal of swamping the trump regime.

However I have an initiative that could derail their projects... it's called the "digital town hall project". the goal is to have by county / city a .onion forum only accessible with torbrowser and a passcode send by mail (a new one each month) to all legal resident, so that they can log, anonymously, and express their opinions in a non censored format, with total free speech, even insult, threats etc, so that their opinions can be first understood, acted, and discussed.

I know that it's the anathema to the projects of the Obiden regime, which only sees us as rocks with legs, that they will mold as serfs for their great utopia. However it's necessary, in the sense that live town halls are great, but due to the nature of oral speech, aren't the most conducive way to handle policies, be it from fear or the simple nature of speech... (one can't speak over the others).

my 2 cents.

and it would take 10 min to setup for a non moronic it team, there could even be a blueprint quickly made... aka an open source software which directly send even the passcodes... no need to recode 4000 times the same system, unless to create fake work (could use single key keyboard spaced by mile to even increase the head counts of the social staff).

ps each user of the same city / county has the same pass, no way to know who is who, the quick question is for them to secure a user name, maybe a second pass that they input themselves? details :)
